mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matzip (address, lat, lng, img_url, gu, kakao_map_url, name) VALUES (#{address}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{imgUrl}, #{gu}, #{kakaoMapUrl}, #{name})
mapper.sql: SELECT id, kind_id AS 'kindId', address, lat, lng, img_url AS 'imgUrl', gu, kakao_map_url AS 'kakaoMapUrl', name -- regdate (regdate)있으면 detail에서 오류나길래 주석처리했음다(지윤) FROM matzip WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.select: SELECT t.tagname FROM tag t JOIN matzip_tag mt ON t.id = mt.tag_id JOIN my_matzip mm ON mt.my_matzip_id = mm.id WHERE mm.matzip_id = #{matzipId}
SELECT f.kindname FROM food_kind f JOIN matzip m ON m.kind_id = f.id WHERE m.kind_id = #{kindId} LIMIT 1

SELECT mz.id AS 'id', mz.address AS 'address', mz.img_url AS 'imgUrl', mz.kakao_map_url AS 'kakaoMapUrl', mz.name AS 'name', k.kindname AS 'kindName', mmz.star_rating AS 'starRating', JSON_ARRAYAGG(t.tagname) AS 'tagList' FROM matzip mz JOIN my_matzip mmz ON mz.id = mmz.matzip_id JOIN food_kind k ON mz.kind_id = k.id JOIN matzip_tag mt ON mmz.id = mt.my_matzip_id JOIN tag t ON t.id = mt.tag_id WHERE mz.id = #{matzipId} AND mmz.member_id = #{friendId} GROUP BY mz.id, mz.address, mz.img_url, mz.kakao_map_url, mz.name, k.kindname, mmz.star_rating ;
SELECT count(*) FROM matzip WHERE id = #{matzipId} AND kind_id IS NOT NULL
